problem.markdown:
Indicate whether each energy source is renewable or non-renewable.
>>biomass << [[(renewable), non-renewable]]
>>coal<< [[renewable, (non-renewable)]]
>>natural gas<< [[renewable, (non-renewable)]]
>>wind<< [[(renewable), non-renewable]]
[explanation] Coal and natural gas are fossil fuels and not renewable. Wind and biomass are renewable although biomass can be depleted if not properly managed. [explanation]
problem.p: Indicate whether each energy source is renewable or non-renewable.

div.p: Coal and natural gas are fossil fuels and not renewable. Wind and biomass are renewable although biomass can be depleted if not properly managed.
